features.name: Dashboard
features.description: Main dashboard with metrics, charts, and overview of all ERP modules

features.name: CRM Module
features.description: Customer Relationship Management with leads, contacts, opportunities, and proposals

features.name: Project Management
features.description: Project tracking with task boards, Gantt charts, and resource allocation

features.name: Finance Module
features.description: Financial management including invoices, payments, expenses, and tax settings

features.name: Marketing Module
features.description: Marketing campaigns, lead scoring, landing pages, and analytics

features.name: Document Management
features.description: Document handling with contracts, e-signatures, and version history

features.name: Reports & Analytics
features.description: Reporting system with dashboard builder and export functionality

features.name: Helpdesk System
features.description: Customer support with tickets, SLA management, knowledge base, and client portal

features.name: HR Management
features.description: Human resources with employee directory, timesheets, leave management, and onboarding

features.name: Asset Management
features.description: Asset tracking including register, VPS servers, license tracking, purchase orders, and stock levels

features.name: Billing System
features.description: Billing management with contract library, retainers, recurring billing, and milestone payments

features.name: Workflow Management
features.description: Workflow automation with builder, event triggers, scheduled tasks, and approval chains

features.name: Business Intelligence
features.description: BI tools including dashboard designer, data warehouse, and predictive forecasts

features.name: Collaboration Tools
features.description: Team collaboration with chat comments, activity feed, and meeting scheduler

features.name: Quality Management
features.description: Quality assurance with audit logs, document approvals, and GDPR settings

features.name: Layout Components
features.description: Core layout components including header, sidebar, and navigation

features.name: Modal System
features.description: Comprehensive modal system for creating and managing various ERP entities

features.name: Settings Management
features.description: System settings and configuration management

features.name: Type System
features.description: TypeScript type definitions for all ERP entities and data structures

features.name: Mock Data
features.description: Sample data for demonstration and testing purposes

features.name: Main Application
features.description: Core application component with routing and layout management
